SELECT a.id,a.batchCode,a.storehouseId,a.medicineId,a.quantity, a.money,a.providerId,b.`name` medicineName,c.`name` providerName FROM kc_medicine a LEFT JOIN base_medicine b ON a.medicineId=b.id LEFT JOIN base_provider c ON a.providerId=c.id WHERE a.storehouseId=#{storehouseId}
and b.`name` like concat('%',#{medicineName},'%')

SELECT a.id,a.batchCode,a.storehouseId,e.`name` storehouseName,a.medicineId,a.quantity,d.quantity reportedNum, a.money,a.providerId,b.`name` medicineName,c.`name` providerName,d.id reporteddetailId FROM kc_medicine a LEFT JOIN base_medicine b ON a.medicineId=b.id LEFT JOIN base_provider c ON a.providerId=c.id LEFT JOIN kc_reporteddetail d ON a.batchCode=d.batchCode LEFT JOIN base_storehouse e ON a.storehouseId=e.id WHERE d.reportedCode=#{reportedCode} AND d.isDel=0

SELECT a.id,a.batchCode,a.storehouseId,e.`name` storehouseName,a.medicineId,a.quantity,d.quantity reportedNum, a.money,a.providerId,b.`name` medicineName,c.`name` providerName,d.id reporteddetailId FROM kc_medicine a LEFT JOIN base_medicine b ON a.medicineId=b.id LEFT JOIN base_provider c ON a.providerId=c.id LEFT JOIN kc_reporteddetail d ON a.batchCode=d.batchCode LEFT JOIN base_storehouse e ON a.storehouseId=e.id WHERE d.reportedCode=#{reportedCode} AND d.isDel=0

select id, batchCode, storehouseId, medicineId, providerId, quantity, money, isDel, totalPrice from kc_medicine where storehouseId = 1 and medicineId in (select base_medicine.id from base_medicine where warning > kc_medicine.quantity)
select medicineId as id,sum(quantity) as stock from kc_medicine group by medicineId HAVING (select totalWarning from base_medicine where medicineId = base_medicine.id) > sum(quantity)
